portrait.alt: Captain Sera in explorer gear with a map

message:
Ready to expand your expedition team? Good timing.

I'm Captain Sera, and I train all the explorers who venture into the wilderness. Each explorer has their own strengths and specialties.

Equip them with the right magical items, and there's no obstacle they can't overcome. But send them out unprepared, and... well, let's just say the wilderness doesn't forgive mistakes.
